rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Lady Knight[/i] – If one or more tokens would be created under your control, those tokens plus a 2/2 white Knight create token with vigilance are created instead.
[i]Crest of Daphnel[/i] – Whenever Ingrid attacks, creature tokens you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {1}{W}{U}
